Game.Model

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • Game.Model.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    This holds the player data and the runtime data collected for player It holds the countries he conquered and it can be updated anytime. It also holds list of continents the he has conquered.
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    ndkcha, Jay

    • Method Detail

      • initializeCountry

        public void initializeCountry(java.lang.String name)
        Assign a country to the players. It will automatically award the player with one army inside that country.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the country

      • updateCountry

        public void updateCountry(java.lang.String name,
                          int noOfArmies)
        Update the number of armies assigned to that country
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the country
        noOfArmies - Number of armies used for the country.
